item.title: A South Korean workwear brand is planning to grow its presence globally
item.description: Source: a.mont website. A South Korean workwear company, a.mont, is expanding its reach internationally. Their online store currently operates in Korean and English, with plans to launch Japanese and Chinese versions soon. A.mont offers uniforms and workwear designed by industry professionals, catering to diverse businesses including restaurants, cafes, hotels, corporations, and cosmetics companies. Kim Hyuk, President of a.mont, highlights the changing perception of workwear: “While uniforms were once primarily about neatness, today’s trend emphasizes reflecting a company’s culture and values.
